title: Brady, Rodgers, Darnold, and the NFL Draft
description:
Kevin and Nora open the show by discussing the possibility of Tom Brady becoming a general manager after retirement, Aaron Rodgers on 'Jeopardy!,' and more (2:00). Later, they are joined by Mike Tannenbaum (17:00), ESPN analyst and former NFL general manager, to discuss some questions about the upcoming NFL draft, including how to evaluate quarterbacks, whether Mac Jones is worth trading up for, and whether size matters when looking at draft prospects, and more.
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guest: Mike Tannenbaum
